title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2103.3 - Eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2103.3 - Eligibility

State Regulations
A student is eligible for a Lender of Last Resort (LLR)
loan if he or she meets all of the eligibility requirements for either a
subsidized or unsubsidized Federal Stafford Loan and: (a) is enrolled in an eligible participating
institution of higher education located in New York State; (b) is applying for either a subsidized or an
unsubsidized Federal Stafford Loan; and
(c) has applied to two separate lenders for
such a loan and has been denied a loan by each one. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2103.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
